verses.verse: Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> the firstborn<WH1060> of Israel,<WH3478> (for he was the firstborn;<WH1060> but for as much as he defiled<WH2490> his father's<WH1> bed,<WH3326> his birthright<WH1062> was given<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> the son<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478> and the genealogy<WH3188> is not to be reckoned<WH3187> after the birthright.<WH1062>
For Judah<WH3063> prevailed<WH1396> above his brothers,<WH251> and of him came the chief<WH5057> ruler;<WH5057> but the birthright<WH1062> was Joseph's:<WH3130>)
The sons,<WH1121> I say, of Reuben<WH7205> the firstborn<WH1060> of Israel<WH3478> were, Hanoch,<WH2585> and Pallu,<WH6396> Hezron,<WH2696> and Carmi.<WH3756>
The sons<WH1121> of Joel;<WH3100> Shemaiah<WH8098> his son,<WH1121> Gog<WH1463> his son,<WH1121> Shimei<WH8096> his son,<WH1121>
Micah<WH4318> his son,<WH1121> Reaia<WH7211> his son,<WH1121> Baal<WH1168> his son,<WH1121>
Beerah<WH880> his son,<WH1121> whom<WH834> Tilgathpilneser<WH8407> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> captive:<WH1540> he was prince<WH5387> of the Reubenites.<WH7206>
And his brothers<WH251> by their families,<WH4940> when the genealogy<WH3188> of their generations<WH8435> was reckoned,<WH3187> were the chief,<WH7218> Jeiel,<WH3273> and Zechariah,<WH2148>

And Bela<WH1106> the son<WH1121> of Azaz,<WH5811> the son<WH1121> of Shema,<WH8087> the son<WH1121> of Joel,<WH3100> who<WH1931> dwelled<WH3427> in Aroer,<WH6177> even to Nebo<WH5015> and Baalmeon:<WH1186>

And eastward<WH4217> he inhabited<WH3427> to the entering<WH935> in of the wilderness<WH4057> from the river<WH5104> Euphrates:<WH6578> because<WH3588> their cattle<WH4735> were multiplied<WH7235> in the land<WH776> of Gilead.<WH1568>

And in the days<WH3117> of Saul<WH7586> they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with the Hagarites,<WH1905> who fell<WH5307> by their hand:<WH3027> and they dwelled<WH3427> in their tents<WH168> throughout<WH5921> all<WH3605> the east<WH4217> land of Gilead.<WH1568>
And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> dwelled<WH3427> over<WH5048> against<WH5048> them, in the land<WH776> of Bashan<WH1316> to Salcah:<WH5548>
Joel<WH3100> the chief,<WH7218> and Shapham<WH8223> the next,<WH4932> and Jaanai,<WH3285> and Shaphat<WH8202> in Bashan.<WH1316>

And their brothers<WH251> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers<WH1> were, Michael,<WH4317> and Meshullam,<WH4918> and Sheba,<WH7652> and Jorai,<WH3140> and Jachan,<WH3275> and Zia,<WH2127> and Heber,<WH5677> seven.<WH7651>

These<WH428> are the children<WH1121> of Abihail<WH32> the son<WH1121> of Huri,<WH2359> the son<WH1121> of Jaroah,<WH3386> the son<WH1121> of Gilead,<WH1568> the son<WH1121> of Michael,<WH4317> the son<WH1121> of Jeshishai,<WH3454> the son<WH1121> of Jahdo,<WH3163> the son<WH1121> of Buz;<WH938>
Ahi<WH277> the son<WH1121> of Abdiel,<WH5661> the son<WH1121> of Guni,<WH1476> chief<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>
And they dwelled<WH3427> in Gilead<WH1568> in Bashan,<WH1316> and in her towns,<WH1323> and in all<WH3605> the suburbs<WH4054> of Sharon,<WH8289> on their borders.<WH8444>

All<WH3605> these were reckoned<WH3187> by genealogies<WH3187> in the days<WH3117> of Jotham<WH3147> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and in the days<WH3117> of Jeroboam<WH3379> king<WH4428> of Israel.<WH3478>

The sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> of valiant<WH2428> men,<WH582> men able<WH5375> to bear<WH5375> buckler<WH4043> and sword,<WH2719> and to shoot<WH1869> with bow,<WH7198> and skillful<WH3925> in war,<WH4421> were four<WH702> and forty<WH705> thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> and three score,<WH8346> that went<WH3318> out to the war.<WH6635>
And they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with the Hagarites,<WH1905> with Jetur,<WH3195> and Nephish,<WH5305> and Nodab.<WH5114>

And they were helped<WH5826> against<WH5921> them, and the Hagarites<WH1905> were delivered<WH5414> into their hand,<WH3027> and all<WH3605> that were with them: for they cried<WH2199> to God<WH430> in the battle,<WH4421> and he was entreated<WH6279> of them; because<WH3588> they put their trust<WH982> in him.

And they took away<WH7617> their cattle;<WH929> of their camels<WH1581> fifty<WH2572> thousand,<WH505> and of sheep<WH6629> two hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> thousand,<WH505> and of asses<WH2543> two thousand,<WH505> and of men<WH5315> <WH120> an hundred<WH3967> thousand.<WH505>

For there fell<WH5307> down<WH5422> many<WH7227> slain,<WH2491> because<WH3588> the war<WH4421> was of God.<WH430> And they dwelled<WH3427> in their steads<WH8478> until<WH5704> the captivity.<WH1473>

And the children<WH1121> of the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> dwelled<WH3427> in the land:<WH776> they increased<WH7235> from Bashan<WH1316> to Baalhermon<WH1179> and Senir,<WH8149> and to mount<WH2022> Hermon.<WH2768>

And these<WH428> were the heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers,<WH1> even Epher,<WH6081> and Ishi,<WH3469> and Eliel,<WH447> and Azriel,<WH5837> and Jeremiah,<WH3414> and Hodaviah,<WH1938> and Jahdiel,<WH3164> mighty<WH1368> men<WH582> of valor,<WH2428> famous<WH8034> men,<WH582> and heads<WH7218> of the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>

And they transgressed<WH4603> against the God<WH430> of their fathers,<WH1> and went a whoring<WH2181> after<WH310> the gods<WH430> of the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> whom<WH834> God<WH430> destroyed<WH8045> before<WH6440> them.

And the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> stirred<WH5782> up the spirit<WH7307> of Pul<WH6322> king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> and the spirit<WH7307> of Tilgathpilneser<WH8407> king<WH4428> of Assyria,<WH804> and he carried<WH1540> them away,<WH1540> even the Reubenites,<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh,<WH4519> and brought<WH935> them to Halah,<WH2477> and Habor,<WH2249> and Hara,<WH2024> and to the river<WH5104> Gozan,<WH1470> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
